alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:22PM MST until July 17 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 915 PM MST. * At 822 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Chui-Chu, or 12 miles southwest of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Estrella Sailport, Freeman, Stanfield and Ak- Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 140 and 173. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 37 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
